Welcome to my portfolio! I'm a passionate web developer with a keen eye for design and a dedication to crafting intuitive user experiences. With a blend of technical skills and creativity, I specialize in turning ideas into interactive and responsive web applications. Throughout my career, I've had the opportunity to work on a variety of projects, each one pushing me to innovate and refine my craft. Whether it's building a sleek and modern website or optimizing user interfaces for performance and accessibility, I strive to deliver high-quality solutions that not only meet but exceed expectations.

Projects

Survey form

I've designed survey forms that prioritise user experience, ensuring clarity and ease of navigation. My forms are crafted with attention to detail, utilising best practices for both functionality and aesthetics.

Bar graph

I've implemented dynamic bar graphs to visualise data effectively, enhancing user understanding and engagement. With a focus on clean design and interactivity, my bar graphs provide insightful data representation tailored to user needs.

Product landing page

I've designed product landing pages that captivate audiences with compelling visuals and persuasive copy. These pages are optimised for conversions, guiding visitors seamlessly from interest to action with clear calls-to-action and engaging content.

Random quote generator

I've developed random quote generators that offer daily inspiration with a simple click. These generators fetch and display diverse quotes, adding a touch of motivation to users' daily routines.

Technical document

I've authored clear and comprehensive technical documents that serve as valuable resources for developers and stakeholders. These documents break down complex concepts into understandable terms, aiding in smooth project implementation and collaboration.

Calculator

I've crafted calculators with intuitive interfaces that simplify complex calculations for users. These calculators are designed for accuracy and ease of use, enhancing productivity and convenience in various applications.
